phaseData.message: This project has graduated from 10x and being implemented at data.gov

title: De-risking Guide
subtitle: Helping ensure successful tech projects
excerpt: Custom software projects can be costly and risky, with unsuccessful projects costing millions of dollars and providing poor services. The team developed handbooks and training for non-technical decision-makers to support modernizing legacy systems to reduce risk and improve outcomes.
body: Custom software projects can be costly and risky, with unsuccessful projects costing millions of dollars and providing poor services. The team developed handbooks and training for non-technical decision-makers to support modernizing legacy systems to reduce risk and improve outcomes.
name: de-risking-guide

title: DevOps for Privacy Offices
subtitle: Making privacy management more efficient
excerpt: Compliance paperwork management can be a significant burden on privacy offices throughout the federal government as they manage personally identifiable information. The team built a privacy dashboard to manage compliance paperwork, providing easier access, leading to better compliance and time savings, and allowing staff to focus on higher level work.
body: Compliance paperwork management can be a significant burden on privacy offices throughout the federal government as they manage personally identifiable information. The team built a privacy dashboard to manage compliance paperwork, providing easier access, leading to better compliance and time savings, and allowing staff to focus on higher level work.
name: devops-for-privacy-offices

title: Eligibility APIs Initiative
subtitle: Improving service by delivering policy changes as code
excerpt: Changes to policies impact who is eligible for specific programs, but implementation of changes can be time consuming and costly. The team developed a way to deliver eligibility changes as code, speeding implementation and improving service delivery and compliance.
topics: Public service,State IT directors,Federal IT directors,Program administrators
body: Changes to policies impact who is eligible for specific programs, but implementation of changes can be time consuming and costly. The team developed a way to deliver eligibility changes as code, speeding implementation and improving service delivery and compliance.
name: eligibility-apis-initiative
